DOC.brief_summary: Less one third pregnant woman actually achieve Institute Medicine 's ( IOM ) recommend weight gain . To date , randomize control trial study use electronic medical record alert provider initiate counsel patient IOM gestational weight gain recommendation . In investigator 's plan study intervention , use EPIC EMR system , electronic alert ( Best Practice Advisory ) appear provider prenatal care visit . This alert remind provider counsel patient recommendation gestational weight gain . The control group receive standard prenatal care , without electronic alert generate regard BMI gestational weight gain . The investigator hypothesize high percentage patient receive intervention meet IOM guideline weight gain .
DOC.brief_title: Gestational Weight Gain Electronic Medical Record
DOC.criteria: Pregnant single intrauterine gestation Present new OB visit 13 week 6 day gestation They multiple gestation pregnancy They age 18 They speak English
